segments.text: Is it possible that I have a business trip abroad and work in American once in a while ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We are a foreign-invested company and there are many chances to go abroad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any training program for the employees to make a further study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We attach great importance to the all-round development of the staff , and the development of individuals will motivate them to work more diligently and efficiently .
segments.speaker: S2
